{"id":980621115,"question_id":259,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1687848999,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"25 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/980621115/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum Smaller","memory":"41.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int threeSumSmaller(int[] nums, int target) {\n        int res = 0;\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        if(len<3)\n            return 0;\n        \n        \n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n            int j=i+1, k= len-1;\n            \n            while(j<k){\n                \n                int val = nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k];\n                \n                if(val< target){\n                    res+=(k-j);\n                    j++;\n                }else\n                    k--;\n                \n            }\n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum-smaller","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
